uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.signature

Class RBlastMoleculeSignature

  • java.lang.Object
    • signature.AbstractGraphSignature
      • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.signature.BaseMoleculeSignature
        • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.signature.RBlastMoleculeSignature

  • public class RBlastMoleculeSignature
extends BaseMoleculeSignature
    Signature implementation specific to rBLAST.
    Author:
    maclean, modified by Asad to use rBLAST SMILES

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.signature.BaseMoleculeSignature

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RBlastMoleculeSignature(org.openscience.cdk.interfaces.IAtomContainer atomContainer)
      Make an object that acts as a factory for atom signatures and can also produce molecule signatures.

      • getMoleculeCanonicalSignatureString

        public java.lang.String getMoleculeCanonicalSignatureString()
        Get the canonical signature string for the entire molecule. To do this, signatures are made for each atom, and the lexicographically minimal one is returned.
        Returns:
